Package dev.majek.advancements.config

Class Rewards

java.lang.Object
dev.majek.advancements.config.Rewards
public class Rewards extends Object
Specifies rewards which are given when the advancement is completed.

    • function

      @NotNull public @NotNull Rewards function(@Nullable @Nullable MinecraftFunction function)
      Set a function to run on completion. This will activate the function if it is not null.
      Parameters:
      function - the id of the function which should be run upon completion of the advancement or null, if it should be cleared The player will be considered the sender - @s will point to the player
      Returns:
      the current rewards object for chaining
